long_description: Give your Jetboil system extra stability, versatility and dependability with this lightweight, packable support stand and pot stabilizer kit. Stainless-steel pot support adds stability, allowing use of the 1.5-liter Jetboil pot or other pots and fry pans for greater cooking versatility. Glass-filled nylon stabilizer attaches to fuel canister, widening the overall stove base to enhance stability when heavy or tall cookware is used. Pot support and stabilizer kit packs up neatly inside your Jetboil Personal Cooking System, sold separately.
short_description: Give your Jetboil system extra stability, versatility and dependability with this lightweight, packable support stand and pot stabilizer kit.
